sentences.en: An impure life will not suit with a holy faith.
sentences.cn: 不道德的生活中不会存在神圣的信仰.

sentences.en: But there are impure elements to our relationship.
sentences.cn: 但是我们的关系里总有不纯之处.
贩卖不纯海洛因的毒贩

sentences.en: First of all, the incense that was w being burned impure.
sentences.cn: 首先, 正在燃烧的熏香是脏的.

sentences.en: God is purity Himself; nothing impure can come before Him.
sentences.cn: 上帝他自己是洁净的, 任何不洁的都不能到他面前来.

sentences.en: Impure novels have brought and are bringing much misery on the world.
sentences.cn: 不洁的小说已经给世界带来不幸,还将带来更多的不幸.

sentences.en: In some religions pork is considered impure.
sentences.cn: 某些宗教认为猪肉是亵渎的.

sentences.en: Many of the deposits are too small, too impure.
sentences.cn: 许多蕴藏量太小, 质地太不纯.

sentences.en: Metals and impure water are examples of good conductors or insulators.
sentences.cn: 金属和不纯的水分别是良导体和绝缘体的例子.

sentences.en: The air of a big city is often impure.
sentences.cn: 大城市的空气往往是污浊的.

sentences.en: The external manifestations of pure and impure emotions may be the same.
sentences.cn: 纯的和不纯的情感在外在上的表现可能一模一样.

sentences.en: The impure mixture with impurity is purified.
sentences.cn: 含杂质的不纯混杂物被提纯.

sentences.en: These are deliberately made impure by the admixture of a small amount of a different element.
sentences.cn: 通常采取加入少量其它元素的方法以有意使它不纯.

sentences.en: Water that is impure often causes serious illness.
sentences.cn: 不洁的水常会引起重病.

sentences.en: When you are encamped against your enemies, keep away from everything impure.
sentences.cn: 你出兵攻打仇敌, 就要远避诸恶.

sentences.en: You've got a dirty mind , ie You have impure thoughts.

trans.tran_cn: 掺杂的， 掺假的，脏的，不纯洁的
trans.tran_en: not pure or clean, and often consisting of a mixture of things instead of just one
